page.title: 03DIARY ACCOUNT FOR 17/6/85
page.content: {0730:}Awake,lie in bed,put school clothes on.{0800:}Downstairs for breakfast.{0815:}Dad shaves,I clean teeth and wash.{0830:}Say goodbye.Dad takes me to friends in his Sierra car before work(screenprinter).{0900:}Head takes assembly.{0930:}Topic on designing planes.{1030:}Eat apple at break:play game,4040(like hide & seek):check digital watch,bell.{1045: Personal study.{1200:}Lunch of sandwiches,crisps & biscuits {1215-1300:}Playtime.{1300:}Do computer simulation:complete Domesday work. {1500:}Walk home as Mum working overtime.{1520:}Paint model plane. {1600:}Brother home from Grammar school:watch video film.{1800:}Family dinner.{1840:}Read adventure story. {1930:}Change for karate club .{2100: Come home for lemonade & mars bar before teeth cleaned and bed.........
